name: Vontiva Mobile Solutions
tag_list: android, ios, blackberry, app, application, bill-shock, mobile, family-plans, usage
overview:
Vontive Mobile Solutions is a smartphone application developer based out of Ottawa, Ontario.

Currently Vontiva is creating a smartphone application called myBounds that allows family plan users, as well as individuals to track and allocate minutes, text messages and data usage on their smartphone plan.

What makes myBounds unique is the ability to track the usages of other smartphones on your plan from either a web based platform or simply from your own smartphone.

myBounds is created to help consumers avoid the dreaded billshock that can leave innocent consumers with bills of hundreds, if not thousands of dollars.
